name: 吳建勳
objective:
先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車引擎實習，包含汽油引擎拆裝，引擎實驗，引擎量測與調整，點火、燃油、冷卻及潤滑系統之檢測及故障排除，定期調諧保養及引擎排氣檢測。
Automobile Engine Service Shop Practice, Gasoline Engine Assembly, Engine Test, Engine Tune-up and Repair, Trouble-shooting and Instrument Adjustment on: Ignition System, Fuel System, Cooling System, Lubrication System, and Starting System, Routine Engine Tune-Up and Engine Exhaust Emission Check .
schedule:
平時點名：10%
平時練習：20%
期中報告：35%
期末報告：35%
